law.catch_line: Possession Of One Ounce Or Less Of Marihuana; Enforcement Consistent With Non Criminal Disposition Provisions Of Sec. 21 D Of Chapter 40; Duty Of Police Department; Notice; Failure To File Certificate Of Completion Of Drug Awareness Program
law.text: The police department serving each political subdivision of the Commonwealth shall enforce The person in charge of each such department shall direct the department’s public safety officer or another appropriate member of the department to function as a liaison between the department and persons providing drug awareness programs pursuant to The person in charge shall also issue books of non-criminal citation forms to the department’s officers which conform with the provisions of this In addition to the notice requirements set forth in If an offender under the age of eighteen, a parent or legal guardian fails to file with the Clerk of the appropriate Court a certificate that the offender has completed a drug awareness program in accordance with Factors to be considered in weighing cause shall be limited to financial capacity to pay any increase, the offender’s ability to participate in a compliant drug awareness program and the availability of a suitable drug awareness program. Any civil penalties imposed under the provisions of ″An Act Establishing A Sensible State Marihuana Policy″ shall inure to the city or town where the offense occurred.
